Tasks.Task Description: Clone the sample project from the GitHub repository and navigate to the JavaScript-v4 subdirectory.
Set up environment variables to connect to the storage account, Computer Vision, and Cosmos DB service.

Tasks.Task Description: Configure the Azure Function to accept the uploaded file as a blob parameter.

Tasks.Task Description: Implement the code to analyze the uploaded blob using the Computer Vision service.

Tasks.Task Description: Use output bindings to insert the analyzed image text, as a JSON object, into Cosmos DB.
Review the function code and bindings in the process-blobs.js file to understand how the function is defined.

Tasks.Task Description: Use the func settings add command to add the Azure Blob Storage connection string to your project settings.

Tasks.Task Description: Use Visual Studio Code to create a Python function project and add storage blob input function binding.

Tasks.Task Description: Use the Azure pricing calculator to estimate costs and optimize your storage account to manage costs effectively.
